member.name: T:Mindbox.Expressions.BooleanExpressions
member.summary: Combines boolean expressions.

member.name: M:Mindbox.Expressions.BooleanExpressions.CombineViaAndAlso(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{System.Boolean}}})
member.summary: Combines boolean expressions without parameters via AndAlso (logical "and" that evaluates the second argument only when the first one is true).
member.param: Boolean expressions without parameters to be combined. Cannot be null. Cannot be empty. Cannot contain null values.
member.exception: When expressions parameter is null.
When expressions parameter is empty or contains null values.

member.name: T:Mindbox.Expressions.Extensions
member.summary: Contains extension methods.

member.name: M:Mindbox.Expressions.Extensions.ExpandExpressions(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression)
member.summary: Finds nested expression evaluations in the expression and, if possible, expands their bodies and substitutes the parameters with the argument values. Nested expression evaluation can be either Evaluate method call or Expression{}.Compile method call producing a delegate that is then invoked.
member.param: Expression that can contain nested expression evaluations. Cannot be null.
member.returns: Expression with replaced nested expression evaluations.

member.name: M:Mindbox.Expressions.Extensions.ExpandExpressions``1(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{``0})
member.summary: Finds nested expression evaluations in the expression and, if possible, expands their bodies and substitutes the parameters with the argument values. Nested expression evaluation can be either Evaluate method call or Expression{}.Compile method call producing a delegate that is then invoked.
member.param: Expression that can contain nested expression evaluations. Cannot be null.
member.returns: Expression with replaced nested expression evaluations.

member.name: M:Mindbox.Expressions.Extensions.ExpandExpressions``1(System.Linq.IQueryable{``0})
member.summary: Finds nested expression evaluations in the expressions used to build the query and, if possible, expands their bodies and substitutes the parameters with the argument values. Nested expression evaluation can be either Evaluate method call or Expression{}.Compile method call producing a delegate that is then invoked.
member.param: Query build using expressions that can contain nested expression evaluations. Cannot be null.
member.returns: Query rebuilt using expressions with replaced nested expression evaluations.

member.name: M:Mindbox.Expressions.Extensions.Evaluate``1(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0}})
member.summary: Represent expression evaluation. Intended to be used in another expression that is later transformed via ExpandExpressions method. If called during run-time, compiles the expression and evaluates the resulting delegate.
member.param: Expression being evaluated. Cannot be null.

member.summary: Represent expression evaluation. Intended to be used in another expression that is later transformed via ExpandExpressions method. If called during run-time, compiles the expression and evaluates the resulting delegate.

member.name: T:Mindbox.Expressions.ReflectionExpressions
member.summary: Allows acquiring MemberInfo objects and member names in a refactoring friendly way via expressions.

member.name: M:Mindbox.Expressions.ReflectionExpressions.TryGetMethodInfo``1(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Object}})
member.summary: Tries to find MethodInfo via the method call expression. This overload is for instance methods (and extension methods) with return value.
member.typeparam: Declaring type for instance methods. First parameter type for extension methods.
member.param: Method call expression. Can contain any valid argument values.
member.returns: MethodInfo or null (if the expression is not a method call expression).

member.name: M:Mindbox.Expressions.ReflectionExpressions.TryGetMethodInfo``1(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Action{``0}})
member.summary: Tries to find MethodInfo via the method call expression. This overload is for instance methods (and extension methods) without return value.
member.typeparam: Declaring type for instance methods. First parameter type for extension methods.
member.param: Method call expression. Can contain any valid argument values.
member.returns: MethodInfo or null (if the expression is not a method call expression).

member.name: M:Mindbox.Expressions.ReflectionExpressions.TryGetMethodInfo(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{System.Object}})
member.summary: Tries to find MethodInfo via the method call expression. This overload is for static methods with return value.
member.param: Method call expression. Can contain any valid argument values.
member.returns: MethodInfo or null (if the expression is not a method call expression).

member.name: M:Mindbox.Expressions.ReflectionExpressions.TryGetMethodInfo(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Action})
member.summary: Tries to find MethodInfo via the method call expression. This overload is for static methods without return value.
member.param: Method call expression. Can contain any valid argument values.
member.returns: MethodInfo or null (if the expression is not a method call expression).

member.name: M:Mindbox.Expressions.ReflectionExpressions.TryGetMethodInfo(System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression)
member.summary: Tries to find MethodInfo via the method call expression. This overload is for cases when you already have the expression object.
member.param: Method call expression. Can contain any valid argument values.
member.returns: MethodInfo or null (if the expression is not a method call expression).

member.name: M:Mindbox.Expressions.ReflectionExpressions.GetMethodInfo``1(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Object}})
member.summary: Finds MethodInfo via the method call expression. This overload is for instance methods (and extension methods) with return value.
member.typeparam: Declaring type for instance methods. First parameter type for extension methods.
member.param: Method call expression. Can contain any valid argument values.
member.exception: The expression is null.
The expression is not a method call expression.

member.summary: Finds MethodInfo via the method call expression. This overload is for static methods with return value.
member.param: Method call expression. Can contain any valid argument values.
member.exception: The expression is null.

member.summary: Finds MethodInfo via the method call expression. This overload is for static methods without return value.
member.param: Method call expression. Can contain any valid argument values.

member.name: M:Mindbox.Expressions.ReflectionExpressions.TryGetMethodName``1(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Object}})
member.summary: Tries to find method name via the method call expression. This overload is for instance methods (and extension methods) with return value.
member.typeparam: Declaring type for instance methods. First parameter type for extension methods.
